com.virgilsecurity.purekit

Class Pure

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.virgilsecurity.purekit.Pure

  • public class Pure
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for interactions with PureKit

      • changeUserPassword

        public void changeUserPassword(java.lang.String userId,
                               java.lang.String oldPassword,
                               java.lang.String newPassword)
                        throws PureException
        Changes user password. All encrypted data remains accessible after this method call.
        Parameters:
        userId - UserId.
        oldPassword - Old password.
        newPassword - New password.
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • changeUserPassword

        public void changeUserPassword(PureGrant grant,
                               java.lang.String newPassword)
                        throws PureException
        Changes user password. All encrypted data remains accessible after this method call.
        Parameters:
        grant - PureGrant obtained either using authenticateUser(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, com.virgilsecurity.purekit.PureSessionParams) or createUserGrantAsAdmin(java.lang.String, com.virgilsecurity.sdk.crypto.VirgilPrivateKey, long).
        newPassword - New password.
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • recoverUser

        public void recoverUser(java.lang.String userId,
                        java.lang.String newPassword)
                 throws PureException
        Recovers user in case he doesn't remember his password. All encrypted data remains accessible after this method call. Note: this method is under server-side rate-limiting, which prevents adversary from decrypting database.
        Parameters:
        userId - userId
        newPassword - new password
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • resetUserPassword

        public void resetUserPassword(java.lang.String userId,
                              java.lang.String newPassword,
                              boolean cascade)
                       throws PureException
        Resets user password, all encrypted user data becomes inaccessible.
        Parameters:
        userId - User id.
        newPassword - New password.
        cascade - Deletes all user cell keys if true.
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • performRotation

        public Pure.RotationResults performRotation()
                                     throws PureException
        Performs PHE and KMS records rotation for all users with old version. Pure should be initialized with UpdateToken for this operation.
        Returns:
        Number of rotated records.
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • encrypt

        public byte[] encrypt(java.lang.String userId,
                      java.lang.String dataId,
                      byte[] plainText)
               throws PureException
        Encrypts data. This method generates keypair that is unique for given userId and dataId, encrypts plainText using this keypair and stores public key and encrypted private key. Multiple encryptions for the same userId and dataId are allowed, in this case existing keypair will be used.
        Parameters:
        userId - User Id of data owner.
        dataId - DataId.
        plainText - Plain text.
        Returns:
        Cipher text.
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • encrypt

        public byte[] encrypt(java.lang.String userId,
                      java.lang.String dataId,
                      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> otherUserIds,
                      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> roleNames,
                      java.util.Collection<com.virgilsecurity.sdk.crypto.VirgilPublicKey> publicKeys,
                      byte[] plainText)
               throws PureException
        Encrypts data. This method generates keypair that is unique for given userId and dataId, encrypts plainText using this keypair and stores public key and encrypted private key. Multiple encryptions for the same userId and dataId are allowed, in this case existing keypair will be used.
        Parameters:
        userId - User Id of data owner.
        dataId - Data Id.
        otherUserIds - Other user ids, to whom access to this data will be given.
        roleNames - Roles that access to this data will be given.
        publicKeys - Other public keys, to which access to this data will be given.
        plainText - Plain text.
        Returns:
        Cipher text.
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • decrypt

        public byte[] decrypt(PureGrant grant,
                      java.lang.String dataId,
                      byte[] cipherText)
               throws PureException
        Decrypts data.
        Parameters:
        grant - User PureGrant obtained using authenticateUser(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, com.virgilsecurity.purekit.PureSessionParams) or createUserGrantAsAdmin(java.lang.String, com.virgilsecurity.sdk.crypto.VirgilPrivateKey, long) methods.
        dataId - Data Id that was used during encryption.
        cipherText - Cipher text.
        Returns:
        Plain text.
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • decrypt

        public byte[] decrypt(PureGrant grant,
                      java.lang.String ownerUserId,
                      java.lang.String dataId,
                      byte[] cipherText)
               throws PureException
        Decrypts data.
        Parameters:
        grant - User PureGrant obtained using authenticateUser(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, com.virgilsecurity.purekit.PureSessionParams) or createUserGrantAsAdmin(java.lang.String, com.virgilsecurity.sdk.crypto.VirgilPrivateKey, long) methods.
        ownerUserId - Owner userId, pass null if PureGrant belongs to owner.
        dataId - Data Id that was used during encryption.
        cipherText - Cipher text.
        Returns:
        Plain text.
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • decrypt

        public byte[] decrypt(com.virgilsecurity.sdk.crypto.VirgilPrivateKey privateKey,
                      java.lang.String ownerUserId,
                      java.lang.String dataId,
                      byte[] cipherText)
               throws PureException
        Decrypts data.
        Parameters:
        privateKey - Private key from corresponding public key that was used during encrypt(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, byte[]), share(com.virgilsecurity.purekit.model.PureGrant, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) on present in externalPublicKeys.
        ownerUserId - Owner userId, pass null if PureGrant belongs to.
        dataId - Data Id that was used during encryption.
        cipherText - Cipher text.
        Returns:
        Plain text.
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • share

        public void share(PureGrant grant,
                  java.lang.String dataId,
                  java.lang.String otherUserId)
           throws PureException
        Gives possibility to decrypt data to other user that is not data owner. Shared data can then be decrypted using other user's PureGrant.
        Parameters:
        grant - PureGrant of data owner.
        dataId - Data Id.
        otherUserId - User Id of user to whom access is given.
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • shareToRole

                        java.lang.String dataId,
                        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> roleNames)
                 throws PureException
        Share data to roles
        Parameters:
        grant - pure grant
        dataId - dataId
        roleNames - role names
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • shareToRole

        public void shareToRole(PureGrant grant,
                        java.lang.String dataId,
                        java.lang.String roleName)
                 throws PureException
        Share data to role
        Parameters:
        grant - pure grant
        dataId - dataId
        roleName - role name
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • share

        public void share(PureGrant grant,
                  java.lang.String dataId,
                  java.util.Set<java.lang.String> otherUserIds,
                  java.util.Collection<com.virgilsecurity.sdk.crypto.VirgilPublicKey> publicKeys)
           throws PureException
        Gives possibility to decrypt data to other user that is not data owner. Shared data can then be decrypted using other user's PureGrant.
        Parameters:
        grant - PureGrant of data owner.
        dataId - Data Id.
        otherUserIds - Other user Ids.
        publicKeys - Public keys to share data with.
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • unshare

        public void unshare(java.lang.String ownerUserId,
                    java.lang.String dataId,
                    java.lang.String otherUserId)
             throws PureException
        Revoke possibility to decrypt data from other user that is not data owner. It won't be possible to decrypt such data other user's PureGrant. Note, that even if further decrypt calls will not succeed for other user, he could have made a copy of decrypted data before that call.
        Parameters:
        ownerUserId - Data owner user Id.
        dataId - DataId.
        otherUserId - User Id of user to whom access is taken away.
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • unshare

        public void unshare(java.lang.String ownerUserId,
                    java.lang.String dataId,
                    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> otherUserIds,
                    java.util.Collection<com.virgilsecurity.sdk.crypto.VirgilPublicKey> publicKeys)
             throws PureException
        Revoke possibility to decrypt data from other user that is not data owner. It won't be possible to decrypt such data other user's PureGrant. Note, that even if further decrypt calls will not succeed for other user, he could have made a copy of decrypted data before that call.
        Parameters:
        ownerUserId - Data owner user Id.
        dataId - DataId.
        otherUserIds - Other user ids that are being removed from share list.
        publicKeys - Public keys that are being removed from share list.
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • deleteRole

        public void deleteRole(java.lang.String roleName,
                       boolean cascade)
                throws PureException
        Deletes role making previously encrypted data inaccessible.
        Parameters:
        roleName - role name
        cascade - true - will keep access to previously encrypted data
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException

      • assignRole

        public void assignRole(java.lang.String roleName,
                       PureGrant grant,
                       java.lang.String userId)
                throws PureException
        Assigns user to role
        Parameters:
        roleName - role name
        grant - grant of one of users, that are already assigned to this role
        userId - user id of user who will be assigned to this role
        Throws:
        PureException - PureException
